Major_Arcs.title: King Guz and Alley's Clams
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces King Guz, Alley, and the initial conflict around an unpaid debt and transitions into Alley's dinosaur trade-in and purchase journey.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz Debt
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of King Guz's debt and Alley's rescue and confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: King Guz's Wet Predicament and Unpaid Debt

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Purchase
sub_scenes.description: Alley decides to trade in his old dinosaur, leading to a visit to Honest Zog's dealership and the purchase of a new dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Deal Sealed and Zog's Dino's Bite
Alley's Farewell and Mixed Feelings about Dinny
Departure with New Dino & Zog's Advice

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Re-evaluation
sub_scenes.description: Dinny's fate at the dealership and his unexpected behavior during a test ride.

narrative_arcs.title: Unexpectedly Wild Test Ride on Dinny

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Alley returns to rescue Dinny after learning of his past mistreatment.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Dispute
sub_scenes.description: Alley's fishing invitation to Coola leads to a relationship dispute.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing and Misogyny
sub_scenes.description: Scenes of misogynistic musings and fishing frustrations.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations and Apology by the Riverbank

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Advice
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores various romantic entanglements, misunderstandings, and attempts at romantic advice and sabotage.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Accusation and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: A romantic rivalry and investigation leads to a discovery.

sub_scenes.title: Misdirected Violence
sub_scenes.description: Misdirected romantic jealousy leads to violence and clarification.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Mentoring
sub_scenes.description: Advice and mentoring on romantic techniques.

sub_scenes.title: Sabotage Attempt
sub_scenes.description: A jealous caveman attempts to sabotage Koko's romantic advances.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Misunderstandings
sub_scenes.description: Various romantic misunderstandings and accusations.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Interlude and Loss of Control
Clarification of Affection and Misunderstood Kiss

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Troubles and Reflections
sub_scenes.description: Accusations of infidelity, remorse, and reflections on romantic relationships.

narrative_arcs.title: Male Camaraderie and Complaint about Women

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the comedic and chaotic effects of a new dance craze called 'The Twitch'.

sub_scenes.title: The Twitch Dance Craze - Consequences and Pressure
sub_scenes.description: Exploring the negative consequences, social pressure, and varied opinions surrounding 'The Twitch'.

narrative_arcs.title: The Unfortunate Consequences of the New Twist
Encouragement and Dismissal of the New Twist
Social Pressure to Participate in the Twitch Party

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lessons and Misnaming
sub_scenes.description: Floog attempts to learn 'The Twitch' with painful and humorous results.

sub_scenes.title: The Twitch Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: The disastrous consequences of 'The Twitch' and its widespread impact.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Twitch Inquiry and Admission of Failure
Fleeing in Fear and Public Humiliation
Hospital Quiet and Watching the Aftermath

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel Mishaps
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the comedic mishaps and unexpected outcomes of time travel experiments.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel to Spain - Setup
sub_scenes.description: Setting up a time travel experiment to ancient Spain for scholarly research.

narrative_arcs.title: Scholarly Inquiry and Time Travel Suggestion

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Accident during Kiss
sub_scenes.description: A romantic moment in the past is interrupted by a time travel accident.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Traveler's Successful Tuning and Observation
Romantic Kiss Interruption and Time Travel Activation
Time Travel and Accidental Kiss in the Present

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Resolution and Spain Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Resolving the time travel accident and clarifying the purpose of the Spain assignment.

narrative_arcs.title: Confused in the Present Time Lab
Reassurance and Impending Return to Spain

Major_Arcs.title: Adventures in Spain
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a series of humorous and chaotic events in ancient Spain.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Strange Land and Misguided Intervention
sub_scenes.description: A caveman-like character arrives in Spain and misinterprets a serenade, leading to intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Spanish Street Fight and Don Jose Setup
sub_scenes.description: A street fight ensues, revealing a famous matador and setting up the introduction of Don Jose.

narrative_arcs.title: The Famous Don and the Disturbance

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Planning and Ethical Debate
sub_scenes.description: Planning for a bullfight and contrasting views on its ethics.

sub_scenes.title: The Unconventional Bullfight
sub_scenes.description: An unconventional bullfight with a 'brute' and a stone-age axe.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting the Stage for an Unconventional Bullfight

Major_Arcs.title: Return and Romantic Denial
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Alley's return from time travel and the humorous denial of a promised kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Oop/Alley's Return and Kiss Denial
sub_scenes.description: Alley returns, but a promised kiss is hilariously denied due to jealousy.

Major_Arcs.title: Kings and Temporary Rule
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the comedic and chaotic nature of kingship, both temporary and original.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day and Replacement
sub_scenes.description: Setting up a 'King for a Day' scenario and the selection of a temporary replacement.

narrative_arcs.title: Debate on the King's Easy Life

sub_scenes.title: Temporary Kingship Fiasco
sub_scenes.description: The chaotic and humorous failure of the temporary kingship.

sub_scenes.title: Guz as Temporary King - Domestic Dispute
sub_scenes.description: Guz temporarily takes King Guz's place and faces domestic issues with Oompa.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Lazy Indulgence and Bon-Bon Mishap
Broom Attack and Temporary King Plea

Major_Arcs.title: Disputes and Misunderstandings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases various disputes and misunderstandings, ranging from financial to personal.

sub_scenes.title: Clam Dispute and Loss
sub_scenes.description: A humorous dispute over found clams and their subsequent disappearance.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations of Cheating and Fighting Over Money
Seeking Wise Counsel and Loss of Clams

sub_scenes.title: King's Life - Violence, Indulgence, and Ulcer
sub_scenes.description: A glimpse into the chaotic and contradictory life of a king, involving violence, indulgence, and health concerns.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Racket and the Wise Guy's Beating
Fine Advisor's Meal and Self-Serving Thoughts

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Meal and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: A mealtime conflict escalates from dietary concerns to playful betrayal and violence.

Major_Arcs.title: Loose Ends and New Beginnings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc brings together disparate storylines with resolutions and new setups.

sub_scenes.title: Apology, Liberation, and Measuring Task
sub_scenes.description: Scenes of apology, royal liberation, and a ruler proposition for a measuring task.

sub_scenes.title: The Barberous Act
sub_scenes.description: A humorous resolution to a prophecy involving a barber and forced haircuts.

narrative_arcs.title: The Barberous Act and the Bearded Stranger

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Malfunction and Roman Soldier
sub_scenes.description: The Time Traveler's experiment goes awry, resulting in the unexpected arrival of a Roman soldier.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Visitor
